scripts.build: npm run update:lib && npm run clean && tsc
scripts.start: npx cross-env NODE_PATH=./dist INFINITY_NODE_ENV=prod node -r dotenv/config ./dist/index.js
scripts.start:prod: cross-env HOST=localhost INFINITY_NODE_ENV=prod npm run build && node -r dotenv/config ./dist/index.js
scripts.start:dev: cross-env HOST=localhost cross-env NODE_PATH=./src ts-node -r dotenv/config ./src/index.ts
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && gcloud app deploy -q --appyaml=./app.yaml --project=nftc-dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && gcloud app deploy -q --appyaml=./app.yaml --project=nftc-infinity
scripts.pre:push: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build
